articles.title: Greetings to Moroccan King
articles.content:
Greetings to Moroccan King
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Mohamed VI, King of Morocco, on its national day.
					Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop in the interests of the two peoples, the message sincerely wished the King good health and happiness and greater success in his work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Credentials of Belgian Ambassador Accepted
articles.content:
Credentials of Belgian Ambassador Accepted
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Pierre Clement Dubuisson, Belgian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
					 Kim had a conversation with the ambassador after receiving his credentials.

articles.title: Cuban Embassy Officials Visit War-related Site
articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Officials Visit War-related Site
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Charge d'Affaires ad Interim Enrique Montoto Cruz and staff members of the Cuban embassy here visited the historic site associated with the Fatherland Liberation War on Wednesday in the month of solidarity with the Cuban people.
					 Being briefed on the fact that President Kim Il Sung advanced the unique military idea and strategic and tactical policies and wisely led the whole party and army and all the people, staying there during the Fatherland Liberation War, the visitors went round the supreme command post, operation room, etc. at the site.
					
					They also looked round various historic relics associated with the sacred traces of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who grasped the Juche-oriented military tactics and commanding art of the President and fostered his high ambition based on patriotism while staying there during the war.
					
					 The charge d'affaires wrote in the visitor's book that through the visit they came to know well how the President organized and led the Korean army and people to repel the imperialists' aggression and win the victory.
					
					 The exploits of the President will remain long in history, he added.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Charge d'Affaires ad Interim Alexander Matsegora and staff members of the Russian embassy here on Wednesday gave a helping hand to the DPRK-Russia Friendship Kochang Co-op Farm in Chollima County.
					 They helped the farmers in weeding a bean field.
					
					 Saying that they were deeply moved to see the farmers dynamically conducting the 150-day campaign true to the noble intention of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the charge d'affaires hoped that the farm would produce rich harvest this year by successfully carrying the Workers' Party of Korea's plan into practice.
					
					 The guests conveyed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Russian Dancing Troupe Gives Performances in Wonsan
articles.content:
Russian Dancing Troupe Gives Performances in Wonsan 
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The State Academy Beryozka Dancing Troupe of Russia Named after N.S. Nadezhdina gave performances in Wonsan from July 22 to 28.
					 The dancing troupe mesmerized audiences by enthusiastically singing "Song of General Kim Jong Il", an immortal revolutionary hymn, and Korean song "General of Korea" in boundless reverence for General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Put on the stage were female group dance "Beryozka", trio dance "Troika", male group dance "Carters," songs and dances "Small River",  "The Evening in the Suburbs of Moscow" and "Katyusha."
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the Russian people's love for their motherland and their life with refined artistry and perfect ensemble.
					
					 The Russian artistes deeply impressed audiences by successfully presenting "Flower-strewn Pond" from Korean Revolutionary Opera "Tell the Story, Forest" with a song and dance.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Off Press
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Off Press
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Vol. 82 of "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" which systematically and comprehensively carries works of President Kim Il Sung in the chronological order.
					 Contained in the book are 37 works, including historic speeches, conclusions and talks, published by the President from July to December Juche 74 (1985).
					
					 Expounded in those works are the ideas, theories and policies that serve as guidelines in giving full play to the advantages of the socialist system in the DPRK by pushing ahead with socialist construction to meet the requirements of the developing revolution and realizing national reunification and global independence.
					
					 Among them are works "On Further Updating the System and Method of the Socialist Economic Management as Required by the Developing Reality" and "On Some Tasks for Strengthening Companies of the People's Army", which clarify the tasks and ways for rapidly developing the national economy and the matters arising in improving the standard of people's living and increasing the revolutionary armed forces in every way. 
					
					 "Talk to a delegation of the international liaison committee for independent and peaceful reunification of Korea", "Socialist Countries Should Be Firmly United to Jointly Counter the Aggression and War Moves of the Imperialists" and other works deal with the principled problems arising in achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and the matters of building an independent new world by concentrating efforts on the realization of South-South cooperation and establishment of a new international economic order.
					
					 Also expounded in the book are such problems arising in advancing the revolution and construction to victory as following the noble fighting spirit of the anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs, providing the visitors to the revolutionary battle sites with good living conditions and strengthening the work to preserve and take care of cultural relics.

articles.title: Camping Starts at Songdowon Int'l Children's Camp
articles.content:
Camping Starts at Songdowon Int'l Children's Camp
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The 24th meeting to receive campers was held at the Songdowon International Children's Camp on Wednesday.
					 Present at the meeting were officials concerned and groups of campers from Laos, Russia, Vietnam, Tanzania and the DPRK.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and flowers before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the camp and paid tribute to him.
					
					 A congratulatory address and a report were made and then followed speeches at the meeting.
					
					 During the camping, foreign and Korean children will harden their bodies and mind and deepen the bonds of friendship through various activities including joyful maritime physical culture, art and amusement games and "day of nation."

articles.title: Children's Camping Life
articles.content:
Children's Camping Life
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Camping of school children is at high peak at the children's camps across the country.
					Among them is the Sohungho Children's Camp located in Chonggye-ri, Pongsan County of North Hwanghae Province.
					
					The site of the camp was picked up by President Kim Il Sung when seeing round Lake Sohung in August Juche 51 (1962).
					
					Hundreds of school children from Sariwon and Songrim cities and Phyongsan and other counties of North Hwanghae Province are enjoying their happy holidays there.
					
					The camping program includes colorful activities suitable for the ages and psychology of the campers so that they may lead a cheerful camping life.
					
					They are deepening what they have learnt at school and building up their body and mind through various activities including dissemination of knowledge, collection of animals and plants and mountaineering during the camping.
					
					They fully display their talents in public presentation of successes made by sub-branches of the Korean Children's Union, contest of art pieces and the stage of camping evening.
					
					The camping program also includes athletic meeting, amusement game, sightseeing aboard a ship, boating and swimming.
					
					The camp accommodates more than 6,000 school children every year. The camping expense is borne entirely by the state.

articles.title: Children Blessed by Leader
articles.content:
Children Blessed by Leader
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- One more legendary story is said of love for the bright future of the Songun Korea, stirring people deeply.
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il named a baby boy Kim Kwang Myong, who was born into a worker's family of the Wonsan Youth Power Station, while making a long journey for field guidance day and night.
					
					Father Kim Kwang Chun and mother Yun Myong Sun are all discharged soldiers. They have been widely known throughout the country as a couple of "soybean malt house". In order to meet their simple desire, he gave the name full of blessing to the baby.
					
					There are various instances like that.
					
					The leader, who spares nothing to realise what the people desire, has already named a baby girl of discharged soldiers-couple in Taehongdan Hong Dan and a baby girl of an unconverted long-term prisoner Chuk Bok. The names of the children mirror the bright future of the country.
					
					There are many stories telling that he read letters to him from children on the road of inspecting frontline units of the Korean People's Army and sent autograph replies to them.
					
					Seeing the children blessed by the leader, the Korean people feel the firm conviction, will, high ambition and ideal of Kim Jong Il, who provides prosperity and happiness to the generations to come.
					
					The Korean children are growing to be the reliable reserves of the Songun revolution, valued as "king" and treasure of the country thanks to his affection.

articles.title: Japan-U.S. Military Nexus Assailed
articles.content:
Japan-U.S. Military Nexus Assailed
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The Japanese and U.S. officials concerned with foreign affairs and defense recently held a working consultation in Tokyo for the purpose of adopting a new "Japan-U.S. security joint declaration" the keynote of which is to boost the "Japan-U.S. alliance", etc with 2010, the 50th anniversary of the revision of the "Japan-U.S. Security Pact," as a target year.
					  Commenting on this, a news analyst of Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes:
					
					 This was a dangerous military confab between the two war forces. 
					
					 The focus of the working consultation was the need for the U.S. to closely cooperate with Japan in the military field including the former's provision of "extended nuclear deterrence to the latter." At the consultation Japan and the U.S. decided to closely cooperate in the moves to cope with the non-existent "threat" from the DPRK in a bid to push forward the "defense cooperation" and go ahead with the realignment of the U.S. troops present in Japan as already agreed upon. 
					
					 The working consultation helped create conditions for shipping more U.S. nuclear weapons and strategic offensive forces into Japan and pave the way for Japan to massively beef up its forces for aggression under the pretext of expanding the "Japan-U.S. alliance."  
					
					 It is a main strategy of Japan to turn itself into a military power and realize its military overseas expansion.  
					
					 In case the military cooperation is boosted between Japan and the U.S. for the adoption of the above-said declaration and it is put into practice, this will spark off and escalate a new arms race in Asia and, furthermore, create a catastrophic situation including a nuclear war. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that Japan is openly pushing ahead with the moves to adopt the said declaration under the pretext of the fictitious "military threat" from the DPRK. This reveals the long-standing hostile policy of the Japanese reactionaries toward the DPRK and a scenario to invade it in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 The adoption of such declaration would only bring Japan a horrible disaster and consequently, the Japanese reactionaries would not be able to escape the lot of a tiger moth, warns the news analyst.

articles.title: Japan's Redemption of its Past Crimes Demanded
articles.content:
Japan's Redemption of its Past Crimes Urged
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- Another crime committed by Japan against the Korean nation in its history has been brought to light recently to draw the attention of the international community. 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Japan had hatched a plot to divide Korea long before the U.S. did it, according to foreign press reports. 
					
					 Citing facts to prove the fact, the commentary goes on:
					
					 Even after World War II, Japan directly exercised an influence on the policy of the Soviet Union and the U.S. on keeping the Korean Peninsula divided. Japan played an active role in dividing Korea until the last moment of its defeat.
					
					 The Korean people regard it as a big misfortune to have brutal Japan as their neighbor.
					
					 Japan enforced its colonial rule over Korea for more than four decades and pursued a hostile policy towards the DPRK and perpetrated other crimes since World War II. It has committed too many crimes and done too huge damage to the Korean people to count. Japan can hardly redeem all those crimes even if it spends all its assets and sells the whole of its territory.
					
					 What matters is that Japan is seeking its way out in persistently stepping up its hostile policy towards the DPRK, evading its legal and moral responsibility to make reparation for the misfortune and pain and damage inflicted upon the Koreans. This would only lead Japan to self-destruction as it adds to those crimes.
					
					 Japan should admit all those crimes committed against the Koreans and make an apology and full reparation for them.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-Reunification Fascist Actions Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-Reunification Fascist Actions Assailed
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group's frantic fascist suppression of the pro-reunification patriotic forces in south Korea is nothing but its last-ditch efforts to get rid of an abyss of ruin as it is a blatant challenge to the aspiration of the compatriots after independent reunification and the need of the times.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary. 
					
					 It goes on: From the outset of its office the group of traitors brutally suppressed the progressive organizations and people who supported the inter-Korean joint declarations and worked hard to implement them, after branding them as "enemy-benefiting organizations" and "pro-north left-wing forces". Entering this year, this group has become wilder like wolves about to prey upon small animals. 
					
					 The South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification sponsored events on the 9th anniversary of the publication of the historic north-south joint declaration. This deserves praise far from being a crime as it reflects the aspiration and wishes of the south Korean people for independent reunification. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the Lee group is getting evermore undisguised in its fascist suppression of the pro-reunification patriotic forces, vociferating about someone's "sparking off south-south conflict". The true aim sought by it through the said campaign is to justify its fascist terrorism by linking it with the north.
					
					 The contradiction and conflict between the patriotic and traitorous forces, between progressive and conservative forces and between the working masses and the privileged circle which the group describes as "south-south conflict" in south Korea are festering as the days go by due to the traitorous politics and fascist actions of the group against people.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Lee group is misleading the public opinion by spreading misinformation that the "south-south conflict" is fostered by someone. This is preposterous, indeed.
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to halt the fascist suppression of compatriots at once, bearing deep in mind that it would only precipitate its own destruction.

articles.title: Stop to DPRK-Targeted Joint Military Exercises Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to DPRK-Targeted Joint Military Exercises Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- 34 civic and public, youth and students and religious organizations of south Korea including the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification held a meeting for peace against a war around the U.S. embassy in Seoul on July 26.
					 The participants in the meeting denounced the Lee Myung Bak group for persistently kicking up the racket of "sanctions" against the DPRK and staging joint military exercises targeted against it these days, pursuant to the U.S. policy. 
					
					 They said that it is necessary to frustrate the Lee group's reckless moves and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration by the concerted efforts of the Koreans, adding this is the only way for them to achieve the independent reunification of the nation and enjoy a happy life.
					
					 They called upon all the people to work harder to achieve peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 A letter of protest to the new U.S. administration was read out at the meeting.
					
					 The letter held that the arch criminal rendering the situation on the peninsula tense is the U.S. keen to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK and the Lee regime busy escalating the confrontation with it by strengthening the sycophantic and humiliating "alliance" with Washington and fully participating in the PSI, pursuant to its policy.
					
					 It urged the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to drop the hostile policy towards the DPRK, immediately cancel the plan to stage Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises and make efforts to provide a fundamental proposal for the peaceful solution of the Korean issue. 
					
					 At the end of the meeting, the participants handed the letter to the U.S. embassy.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle for Independent Reunification Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle for Independent Reunification Supported
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh issued a statement on July 21 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The statement contended that it is a legitimate independent right of the DPRK to defend the sovereignty of the country from the U.S. military threat getting ever more undisguised with each passing day.
					
					 Demanding that the U.S. withdraw all its aggression armed forces from south Korea and drop its hostile policy towards the DPRK at once, it said:
					
					 We call upon the progressive people standing against the imperialists' aggression moves to vigorously turn out in the struggle for defending peace in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 We fully support the heroic Korean people's just cause, being firmly convinced that under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il they will achieve signal successes in their efforts for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, undaunted by the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the hostile forces to provoke another war.

articles.title: Building Turned into Working Site
articles.content:
Building Turned into Working Site
						
Pyongyang, July 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to a factory on a winter day of Juche 87 (1998).
					An official of the factory felt uneasy about showing the working site with low shade temperature to the leader. Reading his mind, the leader looked round the working site, saying that he needn't feel uneasy.
					
					Later, the officials and workers of the factory built a new building with much care. When the leader visited the factory again, an official guided him to the building.
					
					The official said that the building was built with an ardent desire to see the leader in a room where fresh air and proper temperature were ensured when visiting the factory. The leader told him that this building should be used for the workers and he feels happiest to see the workers in the building good to work.
					
					The building, therefore, became the working site.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador belga
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador belga
Pyongyang, 29 de julio (ATCC) -- Pierre  Clement  Dubuisson presento el dia 29 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, las cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del Reino de Belgica en Corea.
					  Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon recibe a sus clients
articles.content:
Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon recibe a sus clientes
Pyongyang, 29 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 29 el acto de ingreso en el Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon.
					En la ocasion participaron los funcionarios correspondientes y los integrantes de los grupos de campistas de Laos, Rusia, Vietnam, Tanzania y Corea.
					
					Ante todo, los participantes rindieron tributo al Presidente Kim Il Sung tras depositar cesto y ramitas de flores ante su estatua de bronce erguida en el recinto del campamento.
					
					Seguidamente, hubo el discurso de felicitacion, informe e intervenciones. 
					
					Los campistas se forjaran fisica y espiritualmente y ensancharan los lazos de amistad practicando deportes nauticos, actividades artisticas y juegos recreativos y celebrando el "dia nacional", entre otras actividades.

articles.title: Campamento de Ninos de Lago Sohung
articles.content:
Campamento de Ninos de Lago Sohung
Pyongyang, 29 de julio (ATCC) -- En estos dias, esta en su plenitud el campismo de los ninos escolares en los establecimientos distribuidos para este fin a lo largo del pais, inclusive el Campamento de Ninos del Lago Sohung situado en la comuna de Chonggye del distrito de Pongsan de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung se persono a fijar el solar del campamento durante su visita al lago Sohung en agosto del 51 (1962) de la Era Juche.
					
					  Cientos de inquilinos de ahora provienen de las ciudades de Sariwon y de Songrim y del distrito de Phyongsan y otras partes de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					
					  Ellos repasan lo que aprendieron en la escuela y se forjan fisica y espiritualmente tomando parte en varias actividades organizadas conforme a sus edades y caracteristicas psicologicas como la difusion de conocimientos, la coleccion de animales y plantas y el alpinismo.
					
					  En particular, miden sus talentos en la presentacion de orgullos de su grupo, el concurso de piezas artisticas y las escenas nocturnas del campismo.
					
					  Ademas, multiplican el placer de la vida campista los programas deportivo-culturales, entre otros, el torneo deportivo y el de juegos recreativos, el paseo en lanchas o botes, la natacion, etc.
					
					  El campamento acoge cada ano a mas de 6 mil clientes.
					
					El Estado cubre todos los gastos de ellos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica confabulacion militar Japon-EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica confabulacion militar Japon-EE.UU.
 Pyongyang, 29 de julio (ATCC) -- Recientemente, los encargados de los asuntos diplomaticos y de defensa de Japon y Estados Unidos sostuvieron en Tokio una reunion de trabajo con vistas a aprobar la nueva "declaracion conjunta de seguridad Japon-EE.UU.", que incluya, entre otras cosas, la ampliacion de la alianza bilateral, hacia 2010 en que se cumpliran 50 anos de la enmienda del "tratado de seguridad Japon-EE.UU.".
					  En un comentario individual difundido este miercoles, el rotativo Rodong Sinmun califica esa reunion de peligrosa conspiracion militar entre esas dos fuerzas belicistas.
					
					  En esa ocasion los debates fueron enfocados al problema de cooperar estrechamente en el dominio militar, inclusive el ofrecimiento del "ampliado disuasivo nuclear para defender a Japon" por parte de EE.UU., adelanta el comentarista y continua:
					
					  Igualmente, ambas partes coincidieron en solidarizarse y cooperar estrechamente en la "defensa" para hacer frente a la inexistente "amenaza" de la RPDC y continuar la reorganizacion de las tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en Japon como ya fue acordado.
					
					  Como resultado, se dieron las posibilidades de emplazar en el territorio japones mas armas nucleares y otras fuerzas de ataque estrategico de EE.UU. y ese pais isleno podra aumentar abiertamente en gran medida sus fuerzas agresoras pretextando la ampliacion de la "alianza" bilateral.
					
					  Japon tiene por su estrategia principal la conversion en una potencia militar y el expansionismo a ultramar a fuerza de bayonetas.
					
					  Si se fortalece practicamente la cooperacion militar entre esos dos paises con vistas a la aprobacion de la nueva "declaracion conjunta de seguridad Japon-EE.UU.", se generara y se agudizara la nueva carrera armamentista en Asia y a la larga, se daran las circunstancias tan catastroficas como la guerra nuclear.
					
					  Lo insoslayable del caso es que Japon impulsa abiertamente la aprobacion de esa "declaracion" bajo el pretexto de la falsa "amenaza militar" proveniente de la RPDC.
					
					  Esto refleja la anejada politica hostil de los reaccionarios japoneses a Corea y el intento de ellos de agredirla confabulandose con EE.UU.
					
					  La nueva "declaracion conjunta de seguridad Japon-EE.UU." causara a este pais isleno solo los desastres catastroficos que daran la muerte a los reaccionarios japoneses.
